Title: Silverlight for Umbraco
Description: Silverligt web site skin for umbraco CMS
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Silverligt web site skin for umbraco CMS


This project is an silverlight extension/package for the Umbraco CMS system.

Screen dump:



How to install:
  • After installing umbraco, click the "Launch Umbraco" button at the bottom of the Web installation complete page. If for any reason you have already closed this, simply navigate to your domain and add /umbraco to the end of it.
  • Login to Umbraco (yourwebsitename/umbraco) using "admin" for the username, and the password you setup during the Web install.
  • Once you are logged in, click the "Developer" section at the bottom of the page.
  • Right click on the "Macro" folder and select "Import Package".
  • In the Import Package dialogue, click the link that says "Upload a package file".
